allowAirDrop.title: Allow Air Drop
allowAirDrop.description: If false, disables AirDrop. Requires a supervised device.

allowPasswordSharing.title: Allow Password Sharing
allowPasswordSharing.description: If set to false, users can not share their passwords with the Airdrop Passwords feature.

allowPasswordProximityRequests.title: Allow Proximity Based Password Sharing Requests
allowPasswordProximityRequests.description: If false, disables requesting passwords from nearby devices.
